item.title: Zoo feeds African wild dogs live sheep to keep them wild (Figure)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Zoos feed African wild dogs to live sheep to keep them wild (Figure) CCTV International www.cctv.com March 12, 2007, 10:50 Source. New Business News Zoo Feeds African Wild Dogs Live Sheep to Keep Them Wild A frightened shivering sheep, a group of howling madly jumped on the African wild dogs …… bloody, brutal, in the sheep tearing heart of the cry, it is the flesh of the wild dogs piece by piece to tear off, finally only left broken skeleton, and those who eat meat of the wild dogs, face covered with blood, the eyes of the fierce light.
